thread.title: Scott Eastwood and Charlotte McKinney Fuel Dating Rumors With Beach Trip
thread.title_full: Scott Eastwood and Charlotte McKinney Fuel Dating Rumors With Beach Trip

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Scott Eastwood and Charlotte McKinney Fuel Dating Rumors With Beach Trip
text:
Comments The 'Longest Ride' actor is pictured enjoying a warm summer day with the 'Joe Dirt 2' actress on the Miami beach. 
New couple alert! Scott Eastwood reportedly hooks up with "Joe Dirt 2" blonde bombshell Charlotte McKinney . They have been romantically linked for some time and their trip together to Malibu beach added fuel to the dating reports. The couple reportedly went paddleboarding. "They were all over each other - holding hands and getting touchy-feely," a source told Us Weekly . In one picture, a shirtless Scott was seen walking barefoot together with Charlotte who rocked daisy dukes. Scott Eastwood goes shirtless for a beach stroll with model Charlotte McKinney http://t.co/k1zzPbFHst pic.twitter.com/7L7QWOFZEV � People magazine (@people) October 3, 2015 Charlotte McKinney, a model-turned-actress, recently split from actor Stephen Dorff while Scott Eastwood was linked to model Brittany Brousseau in May. Dating is about "trust, similar passions ... and the sex has to be great," he told PEOPLE in April. "If any one of these things is off, it just might not work."
